about_the_game:
ScreenTRPG is a free 3D Virtual Tabletop tool for TTRPGs(tabletop role-playing games).

You can create your own adventure scenarios and play online with friends, which is similar to a virtual tabletop platform, with extended features.

Design you campaigns!

With ScreenTRPG, you can build up the scenes where your story takes place, with a variety of map components, including mordern and fantasy style,

You can draw the terrian and adjust the weather.

You can import your own model into the scene and use it the the adventrue.

Play with friends online!

You can create your own room and invite your friends to join the game.

The Gamemaster can change the game settings while hosting the game.

You can chat with friends and use dice-roll commands in chat window. Private Chat is also supported.

Create your character!

You can create characters by filling up the self-calculating character sheet. Different TRPG rule system will have different sheets. 

You adjust height, weight, facial features, and colors of the character.

You can also change the statistics of your game character during the game using chat window.

Share your creations in the Community!

You can upload your campaign to Steam Workshop.

You can also download models made by others from Workshop and use in your game. 

Please note: The game is not a finished product. It is still under development status.  More features will be added in the future. So the game is still a beta build.

In the future, users will be allowed to compose and share their own TRPG rule system!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
